slides.script: I forgot my password 3 times in one day. Literally locked myself out of every account. 🤦‍♀️ Has this happened to you?
slides.image_prompt: A frustrated woman staring at a laptop screen showing "Password Incorrect" error messages, ultra photorealistic, 16k, natural lighting, HDR, high resolution, shot on Canon EOS R5, Canon RF 50mm f/1.2L USM, depth of field, --s 750, 9:16 vertical format

slides.script: It wasn't just passwords. I'd walk into rooms and forget why. Lose my train of thought mid-sentence. At only 42, I felt like I was losing my mind.
slides.image_prompt: A confused middle-aged woman standing in the middle of a room with a bewildered expression, ultra photorealistic, 16k, natural lighting, HDR, high resolution, shot on Canon EOS R5, Canon RF 50mm f/1.2L USM, depth of field, --s 750, 9:16 vertical format

slides.script: What doctors don't tell you is that memory loss can start in your 30s. While I was struggling, a hidden truth was being suppressed by Big Pharma...

slides.script: My sister, a neuroscientist, pulled me aside one day. She revealed a natural memory booster used by top Silicon Valley execs. The research was groundbreaking.

slides.script: Day 3: I noticed I wasn't losing my keys as often. Day 7: I could recall names effortlessly. Week 2: I was razor-sharp at work, tackling complex projects with ease.
